channel.title: MySQL related problem/highscore temp

item.title: MySQL related problem/highscore temp
item.dc:creator: @oh_no1 oh_no
item.description:
@oh_no1 wrote:

Method 1:

public static boolean vote(Vote V) { try { query("INSERT INTO `skills` (`Player`,`address`,`timeStamp`) VALUES ('" + V.username + "'," + V.address + "," + V.timeStamp + ");"); //log.log(Level.SEVERE, "Mario's Test outprint Pname IP and date :"+ player.getName() + player.getAddress() + getDate()); } catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); return false; } return true; }
Trigger the vote in another file:

Error msg:

C:\Users**\Desktop\asd\src\com\vexsoftware\votifier\net\VoteReceiver.java:144:vote(com.vexsoftware.votifier.model.Vote) in com.vexsoftware.votifier.net.sql cannot be applied to (com.vexsoftware.votifier.net.VoteReceiver)
[javac] sql.vote(this);
[javac] ^

Been sitting with is trying find solution now its time for some help
Thanks.
